Package com.mimecast.robin.sasl

package com.mimecast.robin.sasl
Implements SASL authentication, including integration with Dovecot.

This package contains classes for SASL authentication.

It integrates with Dovecot using two separate UNIX domain sockets:

  • Authentication (SASL): DovecotSaslAuthNative -> /run/dovecot/auth-client
  • User existence lookup: DovecotUserLookupNative -> /run/dovecot/auth-userdb

The separation allows lightweight recipient validation (RCPT) without exposing passwords
while keeping full SASL AUTH logic independent.

See Also:
  • DovecotSaslAuthNative
  • DovecotUserLookupNative
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.mimecast.robin
    The main package for Robin, a versatile MTA Server and Tester.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DovecotSaslAuthNative
    DovecotSaslAuthNative is a UNIX domain socket client for authenticating users against a Dovecot SASL authentication service using native Java socket support.
    DovecotUserLookupNative
    DovecotUserLookupNative is a UNIX domain socket client for performing user existence lookups against a Dovecot authentication user database (auth-userdb) service using native Java UNIX domain sockets.
